chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall x : R, filter_le (Rbar_locally' x) (locally x)

Premises:
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
filter_le = fun (T : Type) (F G : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) => forall P : T -> Prop, G P -> F P : forall T : Type, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
Rbar_locally' = fun (a : Rbar) (P : R -> Prop) => match a with | Finite a0 => locally' a0 P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end : Rbar -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
Rbar_locally'_le : forall x : Rbar, filter_le (Rbar_locally' x) (Rbar_locally x)
locally_le_locally_norm : forall x : ?V, filter_le (locally x) (locally_norm x) where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
locally_norm_le_locally : forall x : ?V, filter_le (locally_norm x) (locally x) where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
Rbar_locally'_filter : forall x : Rbar, ProperFilter (Rbar_locally' x)
locally_filter : forall x : ?T, ProperFilter (locally x) where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
filterlim_norm : forall x : ?V, filterlim norm (locally x) (locally (norm x)) where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
at_left = fun x : R => within (fun u : R => u < x) (locally x) : R -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope function_scope]
Rbar_locally_filter : forall x : Rbar, ProperFilter (Rbar_locally x)
Rbar_opp_involutive : forall x : Rbar, Rbar_opp (Rbar_opp x) = x
at_right = fun x : R => within (fun u : R => x < u) (locally x) : R -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope function_scope]
Lub_Rbar_eqset : forall E1 E2 : R -> Prop, (forall x : R, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Lub_Rbar E1 = Lub_Rbar E2
completeness : forall E : R -> Prop, bound E -> (exists x : R, E x) -> {m : R | is_lub E m}
plus_opp_l : forall x : ?G, plus (opp x) x = zero where ?G : [ |- AbelianGroup]
Rbar_lt_locally : forall (a b : Rbar) (x : R), Rbar_lt a x -> Rbar_lt x b -> exists delta : posreal, forall y : R, Rabs (y - x) < delta -> Rbar_lt a y /\ Rbar_lt y b
locally_2d_align : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall eps : posreal, (forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> P u v) -> forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> Q u v) -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
Rbar_ub_Finite : forall (E : Rbar -> Prop) (l : R), Rbar_is_upper_bound E l -> is_upper_bound (fun x : R => E x) l
filter_le_trans : forall (T : Type) (F G H : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), filter_le F G -> filter_le G H -> filter_le F H
norm_scal : forall (l : ?K) (x : ?V), norm (scal l x) <= abs l * norm x where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_compat1 : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : R), norm (minus y x) < eps -> ball x eps y where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
Build_ProperFilter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), (forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x) -> Filter F -> ProperFilter F
filterlim_scal : forall (k : ?K) (x : ?V), filterlim (fun z : ?K * ?V => scal (fst z) (snd z)) (filter_prod (locally k) (locally x)) (locally (scal k x)) where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_compat2 : forall (x y : ?V) (eps : posreal), ball x eps y -> norm (minus y x) < norm_factor * eps where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
filter_forall : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x) -> ?F P where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
R_complete_ax2 : forall F1 F2 : (R -> Prop) -> Prop, filter_le F1 F2 -> filter_le F2 F1 -> R_complete_lim F1 = R_complete_lim F2
R_complete_close : forall F1 F2 : (R -> Prop) -> Prop, filter_le F1 F2 -> filter_le F2 F1 -> close (R_complete_lim F1) (R_complete_lim F2)
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [ |- Filter ?F]
filter_le_refl : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), filter_le F F
filter_and : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, ?F P -> ?F Q -> ?F (fun x : ?T => P x /\ Q x) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [ |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_norm_zero : forall f : ?U -> ?V, filterlim (fun x : ?U => norm (f x)) ?F (locally 0) -> filterlim f ?F (locally zero) where ?U : [ |- Type] ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [ |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
locally_2d = fun (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R) => exists delta : posreal, forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> P u v : (R -> R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
